Body:
colors = cycle('bgrcmy')
shapes = cycle('.ov^<>1234spP*+xXD|')
for graph in self.manifold.graphs:
    fig, ax = plt.subplots()
    for cluster in graph:
        marker = next(colors) + next(shapes)
        [plt.plot(batch[:, (0)], batch[:, (1)], marker, alpha=0.7) for
            batch in cluster.points]
        ax.add_artist(plt.Circle(tuple(cluster.medoid), cluster.radius,
            fill=False, color='k', zorder=10))
        plt.plot(*cluster.centroid, '.k')
        plt.plot(*cluster.medoid, '*k')
    plt.title(f'{graph.depth} - {stack()[1].function}')
    plt.show()
